body_html: @mrry -- this is an interesting use-case to keep in mind for your input pipelines work. To summarize, with current situation, if you have an input pipeline that produces >10k items/second in an intermediate stage, that's going to cause 10k session.run(enqueue_op) calls/second which is too much for Python to handle. An automatic solution would batch this up into fewer enqueue_many calls

body: @mrry -- this is an interesting use-case to keep in mind for your input pipelines work. To summarize, with current situation, if you have an input pipeline that produces >10k items/second in an intermediate stage, that's going to cause 10k `session.run(enqueue_op)` calls/second which is too much for Python to handle. An automatic solution would batch this up into fewer `enqueue_many` calls
